GSD.product_version: versions from v3.15 to before v5.4.198
GSD.description:
net: altera: Fix refcount leak in altera_tse_mdio_create

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit 8174acbef87b8dd8bf3731eba2a5af1ac857e239, it was introduced in version v3.15 by commit bbd2190ce96d8fce031f0526c1f970b68adc9d1a. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: altera: Fix refcount leak in altera_tse_mdio_create
